steps.title: What is a good morning message?
steps.content: What is a good morning message? A good morning message is a text or note you send to someone you care about to brighten their day. It’s a way to let your friends know you think about them and invite them to connect. While good morning messages can be romantic and flirty, they can also be positive exchanges between friends.

steps.title: How do you make a girl smile with a good morning text?
steps.content: How do you make a girl smile with a good morning text? Keep your message positive, lighthearted, and funny to make your female friend smile. Don’t overthink your message. For many people, simply knowing you’re thinking about them is enough. Of course, it never hurts to crack a joke or send a meme with your good morning message.

steps.title: How do you make a good morning text personal?
steps.content: How do you make a good morning text personal? Reference inside jokes or memories you’ve made. Compliment your friend on specific traits or qualities that you admire about them. If you know they’re going through a tough time, let them know you’re someone they can lean on for support.

steps.title: Is it okay to send a good morning text every day?
steps.content: Is it okay to send a good morning text every day? Depending on how close you are with your friends, it’s usually okay to send a good morning text a few days a week. If you two tend to text often, a good morning text could become your normal routine. However, it might overwhelm a new acquaintance when you’re just beginning a friendship. If they don’t text back, hold off on double-texting—they might be in a busy season of their life.
